changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Plugin permettant de lire et écrire sur: Plugin for reading and writing on your ModbusTCP/IP and RTU devices
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il faut: After downloading the plugin, you must first activate it, like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Ensuite, il faut lancer l'installation d: Then, you have to start the installation of the dependencies (even if they appear OK
index.md.Rien n'est à modifier dans le champ \" P: Nothing needs to be changed in the "Internal socket port" field of the "Configuration" section
index.md.Dans ce même onglet, il vous faut choisi: In this same tab, you must choose the rest value between updating your equipment (by default 5 sec
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi choisir de mettre un R: You can also choose to put a Retry to re-execute the request on a command/equipment that would be in error (by default False
index.md.Vous pouvez également choisir le nombre: You can also choose the number of attempts and the delay between these attempts
index.md.Pour utiliser le plugin, il vous faut co: To use the plugin, you need to know the parameters of your inputs / outputs of your modbus peripherals (data format, bit order, etc
index.md.Pour les commandes, il y a des parametre: For commands, there are parameters to select
index.md.pour les formats de type LONG\/INT, il f: for LONG/INT type formats, you must specify whether the write/read value will be negative
index.md.il s'agit de la prise en compte ou non d: this is whether or not the offset is taken into account in the register numbers on certain Modbus devices
index.md.Il s'agit de choisir le pas du slider da: This is to choose the step of the slider in the case of an Action/Slider type command if you want to send non-integer values
index.md.Vous ajouter une Nouvelle Commande Modbu: You add a New Modbus Command, and you name the command
index.md.Vous choisissez une commande de type Inf: You choose an Info type command, under Binary or Numeric type
index.md.Il faut choisir ensuite le registre de d: It is then necessary to choose the starting register as well as the number of bytes to read (the number of registers
index.md.Quand vous sauvegardez, la commande créé: When you save, the command created will be deleted, to create as many commands as the specified number of bytes
index.md.Si vous choisissiez un start register à: If you choose a start register of 1 and a number of bytes of 4, the commands will be created
index.md.Vous pouvez bien sur renommer ensuite le: You can of course then rename the ReadCoils/Discretes to your liking
index.md.Pour les Holdings Registers et les Input: For Holdings Registers and Inputs Registers
index.md.Vous choisissez une commande de type Inf: You choose an Info type command, under Numeric type
index.md.Le Registre de depart ainsi que le nombr: The starting register as well as the number of bytes
index.md.pour les floats, le maximum de registres: for floats, the maximum number of encoded registers is 4 registers
index.md.Sur votre équipements, par défaut il y a: On your equipment, by default there will be 3 Action/message type commands created; MultiRegister Write, Bit Write and Multicoil Write
index.md.dans la configuration de la commande, il: in the configuration of the command, you must enter the starting register, as well as the order of the bytes and word
index.md.Par défaut, le fonctionCode est de fc16: By default, the functionCode is FC16
index.md.Veuillez laisser cette configuration par: Please leave this configuration as default
index.md.Pour changer les valeurs sur les registr: To change the values on the registers, use this syntax
index.md.5&4 Nous envoyons l'entier 120 sur: 5&4 We send the integer 120 to a register, starting from the starting register configured
index.md.5 en float sur 4 registres suivant le pr: 5 in float on 4 registers following the previous one
index.md.Pour les types float, écrire la valeur c: For float types, write the value as above, with a
index.md.dans la configuration de la commande, il: in the configuration of the command, you must enter the starting register
index.md.Par défaut, le fonctionCode est de fc15: By default, the functionCode is fc15
index.md.01110111 Cela enverra donc à partir d: 01110111 So this will send from the configured starting register the values True(1) or False(0) to the registers
index.md.Par défaut, le fonctionCode est de fc03,: By default, the functionCode is fc03, because this command will give the value of the register set in binary to the command info "infobitbinary
index.md.Sur la commande info \"infobitbinary\",: On the info "infobitbinary" command, you will have the binary value of the parameter register at the Write Bit command
index.md.Pour changer le bit sur le registre: To change the bit on the register
index.md.1&4 Nous envoyons la valeur 1 au bi: 1&4 We send the value 1 to the bit of position 4 starting from the right
index.md.Sur la commande info \"infobitbinary\",: On the info command "infobitbinary", you see the value 10000101, which corresponds to the binary value of the parameter register
index.md.En ecrivant 1&6, vous aurez dorenavant l: By writing 1&6, you will now have the value
index.md.Vous choisissez une commande de type Act: You choose an Action type command, under Default type
index.md.En agissant sur ces commandes action sur: By acting on these action commands on your dashboard, you will therefore send True or False to your Coils
index.md.Pour écrire sur un Holding Register: To Write to a Holding Register
index.md.Vous choisissez une commande de type Act: You choose an Action type command, under Slider type
index.md.Choisir le format à envoyer au registre: Choose the format to send to the registry (this will change the type of slider on your dashboard, depending on whether it is float or long/integer
index.md.Choisir le pas du slider (pour les décim: Choose the step of the slider (for decimals, write with a
index.md.Choisir aussi une valeur Min et Max pour: Also choose a Min and Max value for this slider
